course_title: Advanced Applied Methods in Social Epidemiology
class_notes: This is an online synchronous course.  Pre-requisites of EPI 591S, EPI 550 or other modeling course, and INFO 530 (could be concurrent) or instructor permission. EPI/GLEPI students and EPI PHD priority registration until November 23.
course_description: Introduction to theory and application of methods relevant to social epidemiology including approaches to causal inference, spatial, and multilevel.
sections: Class Nbr: 4683, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MF 1-2:20p, Instructor: Sullivan/Kim, Status: Open
